title: Ruined my night
body: So this past weekend I was grinding away at ranked and made it to my silver to gold series again. I was 2-0 in my series and while I was waiting to lock in my champion my client crashed immediately giving me a loss in a game. After that I just lost my momentum and lost my series yet again. I know it isn't a new problem with the client crashing but is there any assurance that when I get there my 3rd time it wont happen again?

replies.body:
Client crashes in champ select are generally an indication that your connection is occasionally dropping before reaching the server. I recommend working through our [Network Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to work toward resolving this and preventing future crashes.

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.

It wasn't a connection error though. It was a the LOL server client has stopped working and needs to shut down with no option to try and keep it up. 

Other then in just the Champion Select though my friends and I have been just browsing the shop or going through our profiles and what not and it has crashed too.

EDIT: Thank you for the taking the time to respond.

Because the message you got wasn't a bugsplat, it's likely a problem with your client disconnecting from the game platform service entirely, which in turn crashes the client. I definitely recommend working through the connection guide to see if anything changes. 

Let me know the results.
